question.label: Little interest or pleasure in doing things over the last two weeks
Feeling down, depressed, irritable, or hopeless over the last two weeks
Trouble falling asleep, staying asleep, or sleeping too much over the last two weeks
Feeling tired, or having little energy over the last two weeks
Poor appetite, weight loss, or overeating over the last two weeks
Feeling bad about yourself – or feeling that you are a failure, or that you have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things like school work, reading, or watching TV over the last two weeks?
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite – being so fidgety or restless that you were moving around a lot more than usual over the last two weeks?
Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way over the last two weeks?

effect.label: How difficult have they made it for you to do your work?
How difficult have they made it for you to take care of things at home?
How difficult have they made it for you to get along with other people?
